'''Mythcon 25''' was the twenty-fifth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme: "'''The Language of Myth"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' Madeleine L'Engle (fantasy author), Judith Mitchell (fantasy artist), and [[Verlyn Flieger]] (Tolkien scholar)
*'''Chairman:''' Wendell Wagner
